text: The main villain of all groups 2.12.2021 by Kunar Mayan , Dmitriy Kapor .
In this report we take a look at the Cobalt Strike malware , which is used by various groups to deliver payloads to victims devices .

This backdoor was used in their actions by APT groups Golden Atlas ( aka Silver Map , GoldenMolden and APT12213 ) , Bronze Insitute ( known as ThirdPlase ) , Mutter Putter ( also dubbed Putter Mutter and PutMut ) to download their own malware between 2010 and 2020 .
Cobalt Strike was created in 2010 by Black Dolphin as a means to deliver payloads of other types of malware such as ransomware , adware , keloggers .
Malware such as webshell Kwa - Kwa , grayware Rare and screen capture DanceWithMe can also be attributed to this APT .
The Golden Atlas group targeted the central infrastructure of the South China Sea IT industry .
They targeted Aquatech and Gendarme : the largest IT companies in the region .
Compromise indicators name md5 sha256 Cobalt Strike MD5_TOKEN
SHA256_TOKEN Rare MD5_TOKEN SHA256_TOKEN DanceWithMe MD5_TOKEN SHA256_TOKEN
The Ekomilk group , also known as APT228 , is an alleged group of hacker teams that , as we know , targets various delivery networks around the world .
APT228 has no logic for choosing the country or region to be attacked , but history stores attacks on countries such as : Russia , Western Europe , China , Nigeria .
